news.title: BETHLEHEM Founder JÜRGEN BARTSCH Dead At 58
news.summary:
Bartsch passed away on August 27, 2025, after a long illness, as confirmed by Bethlehem vocalist Onielar. 
 The post  BETHLEHEM Founder JÜRGEN BARTSCH Dead At 58  appeared first on  Metal Injection .

news.title: MUDVAYNE Returns With New Single "Hurt People Hurt People"
news.summary:
